summary:
This is not my mod, but there's no mod about One Punch Man so i uploaded it
Mod adds Saitama as playable race.
descriptionHtml:
Just write "showracemenu" in console and choose the Saitama race (There's a HDT version of it, you need HDT Physics Extension mod for it )
  There's some history about Saitama that i found on wiki ^-^
==================================================================================
[b]Saitama[/b] is the main protagonist of [i]One-Punch Man[/i] and so far the most powerful hero alive in the series. Saitama faces a self-imposed existential crisis, as he is now too powerful to gain any thrill from his deeds.
Initially just a hero for fun, he later registers into the Hero Association as a professional hero, currently B-Class Rank 7, and defends his home in Z-City from Mysterious Beings. Under the Hero Association, he is given the name [b]Caped Baldy[/b].
author: CTRL
